title: Follow Up Appointment
about: Second and subsequent Naturopathic appointments are 15 - 45 minutes long. This is when we implement a full, detailed and specific treatment plan tailored to your individual needs and ensure you are meeting your health goals. Your appointment may also include acupuncture, cupping, or other therapeutic treatments.

title: IV Vitamin Therapy
about: Intravenous drips offer high dose vitamin therapy, at levels unattainable through food or supplementation. IV drips typically last 30-45 minutes. Enjoy your drip while kicking back in a reclining chair, sipping a tea and staying warm by our fireplace.

title: Prescription Renewal
about: Patient’s under the care of a practitioner may occasionally be prescribed pharmaceuticals. Such plans may require regular monitoring and/or the renewal of a pharmaceutical prescription. This appointmet option provides you with a 15 minute check-in to review your current strategy and renew your exisiting prescription.

title: Follow Up Facial Acupuncture
about: Rejuvenation acupuncture is a natural alternative for younger, firmer and healthier skin. Results can been seen as soon as your first appointment. However we've found that longer lasting and more drastic results are usually seen after 6 sessions and full results can be achieved after 12 sessions.

title: Acupuncture
about: Your follow up appointment may already include acupuncture as a part of your treatment plan. If required, stand alone acupuncture appointments may be arranged after the initial intake. Acupuncture is not a requirement, as patient comfort is our number one priority, please voice any reservations you may have.

title: Lab Testing
about: We offer various lab testing through Lifelabs in Dawson Creek, Rocky Mountain Analytical, Doctor’s Data, SIBO Canada and Precision Analytical. Let the practitioner know, on your intake form, if you are interested in any specific testing. We will always discuss the necessity, pros and cons of lab testing based on your specific needs.
